alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 12 at 11:12AM CDT until March 14 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Missouri... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. Ohio River at Cairo. .The Ohio River will continue a slow fall, with levels at Olmsted and Cairo going below flood stage early Tuesday. For the Ohio River...including Olmsted Lock and Dam and Cairo... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 38.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning and continue falling to 23.0 feet Wednesday, March 22. - Flood stage is 36.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
